choices: I have read and agreed to the rules
I have not read/I do not agree with the rules.
1.content:
I know this seems redundant, but I want this to be a decent story with a decent plot-line with good grammar and spelling.

So just to clarify, in order to edit to this story, you must make your chapter make sense, and it has to have good grammar. It must not contain anything that’s a) sexual in nature, b) pedophilic in nature, c) rape, d) illegal, e) hurtful or targets other users, f) unrealistic (there will be no magic in this story), g) harmful. This is all that is listed for now, but the rules can change.
1.title: Rules.

11.content:
So, assuming you have read and agreed to the rules, you may continue.

So, since every journey has to start somewhere, where do you want to start this one off?

Or in other words, what age range do you want to be?
11.title: Starting a new chapter...I mean journey

111.content: How cute! You’ve chosen to be a young child. Now what is your ideal age?
111.title: A young child!

1111.content: What gender do you want to be?
1111.title: Last question!

choices: Ethan Narukami-2, still in diapers. Moody. High highs and low lows. Tantrumy.
Jude Christoph-3, Pull-Ups. A bit of a crybaby. Wants to be a big boy.
Erik Legno-2.5. Diaper pants. Energetic. Squirmy. Hates getting changed.
11111.content: Alright, 2-3 years old, and male. This gives us a few options. I'll lay 'em out for y'all.
11111.title: Male

111112.content:
You wake up to your mom entering your room and pulling away your covers. ''Good morning little guy, it's time to wake up'' she says in a gentle voice. You sit up and rub your eyes, still feeling groggy. You then hop out of bed and look at your soaked Pull Up that sags between your legs. Your face turns to a frown, you wanna get out of wearing them and be a big boy. Your mom sees you frown and comforts you ''Don't worry, let's get you out of that soggy diaper in a bit. But first you gotta eat some breakfast.'' she says.

She offers to carry you to the kitchen, but you protest and want to walk by yourself. You sit next to your older sister who's already eating her cereal. After you've eaten mom takes you to the bathroom and changes you into a dry Pull Up.

Since both your parents are working, during the day you and your sister...
111112.title: Jude Christoph-3, Pull-Ups. A bit of a crybaby....

choices: Lucy, the girl who lives next door.
1111121.content: Sure enough, you see your sitter opening the front door. It's...
1111121.title: Are babysat

choices: Almost, but not fully there yet
11111213.content:
The front door opens and you see a familiar figure standing at the door. She's Lucy, 17 years old and lives next door. She's done a few babysitting gigs at your house, so you and your sister Jenna are already familiar with her.

Lucy greets your mom and then comes to say hi to you and your sister.

Just a quick question before we continue. Jenna is a whole year older than you, but is she fully potty trained?
11111213.title: Lucy, the girl who lives next door.

choices: He started pretty recently, and there's still a lot to go.
He's batting about .45 with accidents. A bit to go, but a good start.
He's more often dry than not, but he still needs to earn those big boy pants.
111112131.content:
Jenna wears underwear all day. She still isn't dry at bedtime, needing to wear a 'Goodnite' to bed, but she can go potty all by herself, with no help for wiping or washing her hands or needing reminders.

How far along is Jude with potty usage?
111112131.title: Yes

111112132.content: And is she in undies, for being so close, or in training pants, for not being quite there yet?
111112132.title: Almost, but not fully there yet

choices: Ask if either of you need to potty
1111121323.content:
Much to her annoyance and disappointment she still has to wear Pull Ups, just like her younger brother, you. She has protested this countless times, but your mom has stayed firm. ''Sorry hun, but until you no longer have accidents the Pull Ups stay on.'' is her usual reply. Eager to get out of Pull Ups and get to wear big girl undies Jenna has been doing her best and managing to get to the toilet in time, mostly.

Back to the present, your mom leaves the house and leaves you and your sister with Lucy. First thing Lucy does, is...
1111121323.title: Disposable training pants, ala Pull-Ups.

choices: You say no, but there's a flicker of doubt in your mind... And bladder.
You're not entirely sure you have to go, but better safe than sorry.
11111213231.content: Lucy checks in on you and your sister, asking if you have to go potty. Jenna says no, but you..
11111213231.title: Ask if either of you need to potty

111112132313.content:
You're not entirely sure, but decide it's probably a good decision to go to the potty just in case. So you nod your head and Lucy takes you to the bathroom, pulls down your Pull Up and you sit on your potty chair. And sure enough, almost right after you've sat down you start peeing. ''That was close!'' you think, realizing that you were probably just minutes away from another wet Pull Up.

Lucy hears you pee and praises you for using the potty like a big boy. ''All done?'' she asks. You...
111112132313.title: You're not entirely sure you have to go, bu...

choices: ...Jenna is drawing on some paper at the table.
1111121323131.content:
You nod and pull your Pull-Up back on, toddling back to the living room.

You see that...
1111121323131.title: Tell her you're done

11111213231311.content:
In the living room Lucy has turned on the TV and what a happy coincidence! Your favorite TV show is on. Lucy tosses you a pillow from the couch and you sit on it, focusing yourself entirely on the TV.

A while into the show you start feeling a slight discomfort, apparently you should have also tried to poop while sitting on the potty earlier. The feeling grows stronger but you try to push it aside, continuing to watch the show. But soon it's too late, you realize it's just going to happen. You lift your butt slightly from the pillow and begin to push, trying to be as discreet as possible. You finish and quietly change position to lie on your belly to avoid spreading the mess all over your backside. Do you...
11111213231311.title: ...your favorite TV show is on!

choices: ...scoldingly. You should have used the potty.
111112132313111.content:
Mommy said that you should always tell the truth. You stand up, your Pull-Up sagging between your legs, and walk over to Lucy.

"Poopy." you say, and that says it all. Lucy picks you up and takes you to the changing table, speaking to you...
111112132313111.title: Announce you pooped

choices: You see Jenna doing the potty dance
1111121323131112.content:
Lucy takes you to the changing table and tears open the sides of your Pull Up. She then pinches her nose and says ''Eww, you made a big stinky, you know!'' in a slightly teasing tone. You're a bit annoyed about it, despite it being meant in a good and fun way. You decide not to make a fuss so you just lie there as she cleans up your bum and slides a new Pull Up on you.

After you've been changed...
1111121323131112.title: ...teasingly-you made a big stinky.

choices: ...ask her if she needs to go potty.
11111213231311122.content: Jenna squeezes her hand against her pants, and dances from one foot to the other. You see this, and...
11111213231311122.title: You see Jenna doing the potty dance

111112132313111222.content: You decide to help her go potty. You take her to the bathroom, and help her sit on the potty, as she begins to....
111112132313111222.title: ...take her potty yourself.

1111121323131112221.content:
Jenna sits on the potty and starts peeing, letting out a sigh of relief. She's very happy with herself, that's one accident avoided and hopefully a step towards getting out of Pull Ups and wearing normal undies. She wipes herself and pulls her Pull Up back on before calling out to Lucy to help her empty the potty into the toilet. Lucy praises Jenna for using the potty like a big kid, something Jenna will definitely remember to point out later when mentioning your previous accident.

Jenna then says she wants to play house for a while, how do you feel about the suggestion?
1111121323131112221.title: Pee

choices: ...in a building built for it, and only for it.
...at some public place, like a pool.
1111122.content: You are placed in your car seat and driven to your daycare, which is...
1111122.title: Go to daycare

choices: Designed to help with potty training
11111222.content: Your daycare is connected to an elementary school, where you will be going very soon. As you enter, you greet your teacher. Your daycare is...
11111222.title: ...in a school.

choices: Just a fart that gives you away
111113.content: You yawn and wake up feeling your wet diaper, and blush as you're picked up for a change and you squirm free and run and hide i the closet and then your stomach grumbles,
111113.title: Erik Legno-2.5. Diaper pants. Energetic. Squirm...

choices: Tara, 2. Diapered. Loves fairies, especially her favorite fairy princess costume
Scarlet, 3. Wants to be a mermaid. Still in Pull-Ups. Tomboy.
Emily, 2.5. In undies, but still has some accidents, day and night. Loves horses
11112.content: 2 to 3 year old girl... Here, have some characters!
11112.title: Female

111121.content: You wake up early one morning and reach your arms out, stretching. You wiggle around, finding that your diaper is dry. About a few seconds later, you realize that you really had to pee. Mommy and Daddy were trying to potty train you and you were starting to recognize your needs but often it was too late. You squirmed, having to make a quick decision. Your bed had a protective railing, preventing you from rolling out in your sleep, however climbing over it wasn’t an option. You either had to...
111121.title: Tara

1111211.content:
You really couldn’t see your mom coming in time for you to make it to the potty. You squirmed a bit and released your bladder into your diaper, giving a soft sigh of relief as you did so.

You moved around in your bed and waited for your mom to come. You didn’t mind the feeling of your wet diaper.

Eventually your mother came in and picked you up out of your bed. “Tara, you’re wet,” she says as she checks your diaper.

You didn’t say anything as she placed you on your changing table and put you into a...
1111211.title: Wet your diaper

11121.content: OK, 4 to 5 then, and you're a boy? Alright. Here are some starter characters

His diaper is wet, like normal. No big deal, let's put him in undies.

Jonas wakes up in the morning, stretching and displacing a few stuffed animals and his blankets as he gets up. His mother, Helen, walks in.

"How's my Mr. Sweetface!" She says, picking up her son, before noting that...

choices: He is taken to the potty

1112124.title: His diaper is wet, like normal. No big deal, le...

11121241.content: As Helen takes her son to the bathroom to use the potty, Jonas says...
11121241.title: He is taken to the potty

111212412.content: "Needta boom boom, mommy." Jonas said, wiggling. Helen smiled, and helping her son onto the potty. After pooping, Jonas...
111212412.title: "Needta boom boom..."

choices: One of his old baby wet wipes that Mommy used when he was changed.
A special flushable wet wipe for learning toddlers.
1112124121.content: Jonas went and grabbed something to wipe himself with. That thing was...
1112124121.title: Wiped himself

1112124122.content:
Helen sighed and cleaned up her son's bottom for him. After that, she also helped him wash his hands, and then went to fix breakfast.

She started cooking...
1112124122.title: Was wiped by Helen

11121241222.content: She made him some scrambled eggs. Jonas liked scrambled eggs, so he ate them quickly. After that, he got ready for school. The first lesson of the day is..
11121241222.title: ...eggs.

111212412223.content: As Jonas toddles into his art class, seeing the plastic easels and crayons, he sees someone, a friend he knows.

113.content: Welp you are a teen congrats.

1131.content:
A few options

Nathan was going to stay with his uncle for the summer, the man was loaded. But also very out of touch. His estate hadn't changed from the 1940s, nor had any thing else. So uncle mistook regular teenager laziness, slackery and low grades for a bigger issue. It's how Nathan ended up in a velvet and lace suit complete with a cloth diaper and being pushed in a wheel chair down the hall. Uncle didn't want anything bad to happen to 'his precious simply nephew'.

In a simlair vain we have Chuck. A very lazy high school student who sucks his thumb when nervous. Chuck is made to take a test with a doctor and when told they won't affect his grades completely fails it. Now he wears jumpsuits and diapers to school as a part of a uniform for Dr.stevenons "special class".

12.content: Sorry, you need to read and agree with the rules.
12.title: I have not read/I do not agree with the rules.

info.brief_description: Choose to be a baby, a toddler, a young child, a pre-teen, a teenager, or an adult.
info.description:
Welcome to this wormhole of interesting stories.

I have a few rules.
1) No erotica
2) No death or gore
3) Your responses MUST BE editted with good grammar and spelling. They will be removed d this requirement is not met.
4) More rules may be added as needed.
5) Have fun, I guess...
